<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name/>=<value> Game
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.70</value></part><part><name>Game Version</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns throttle position. Works only on player's vehicle.</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''airplaneThrottle''' airplane </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> airplane: [[Object]] - </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]  </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_trottle = '''airplaneThrottle''' myPlane </code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setAirplaneThrottle]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>

[[Category:Scripting Commands Arma 3|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on 10:18, 4 January 2020 (CET)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:POLPOX|POLPOX]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
The value that set by [[setAirplaneThrottle]] =/= the value that can be get by [[airplaneThrottle]] when the plane's config ''throttleToThrustLogFactor'' isn't 1.<br>
There're two planes in Vanilla <template><title>arma3</title></template> that the value isn't 1, which are V-44 Blackfish and Y-32 Xi'an.

<code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[setAirplaneThrottle]] 0.5;
[[airplaneThrottle]] [[vehicle]] [[player]];	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>0.793701 if the value is 3</value></part></template>
[[airplaneThrottle]] [[vehicle]] [[player]]^([[getNumber]] ([[configFile]] >> "CfgVehicles" >> [[typeOf]] [[vehicle]] [[player]] >> "throttleToThrustLogFactor"));	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>0.5</value></part></template>
</code>
</dd>
</dl></root>
